abstract: Colorado's State Supreme Court agrees to decide whether cities can ban hydraulic fracturing amid ongoing tensions between local government and state; will begin with cases from Longmont and Fort Collins, two cities that appealed lower court ruling after voter-approved bans on fracking were successfully contested by Colorado Oil & Gas Assn.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court agreed Monday to decide whether cities can ban hydraulic fracturing.

headline.main: Colorado: Court Will Examine Fracking Bans
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Court Will Examine Fracking Bans

snippet: The State Supreme Court agreed Monday to decide whether cities can ban hydraulic fracturing.
